attributes.action: UK government to support global taxation proposals to offset wealth inequality.
attributes.additional_details:
Here is an article highlighting the wealth divide. http://www.theguardian.com/business/2016/jan/18/richest-62-billionaires-wealthy-half-world-population-combined
Here is a UN proposal which could use global taxation methods to raise 400 billion per year to assist developing countries: https://www.un.org/development/desa/publications/wess2012.html and http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/policy/wess/index.shtml
attributes.background: 62 people have as much wealth as world's 3.6B poorest but the United Nations have previously urged countries to impose international taxes through carbon, billionaires & currency taxes to raise more than $400 billion a year. Why hasn't this been done? Let's do it!
